data.eml:eml: A new species of Szelenyiopria Fabritius (Hymenoptera: Diapriidae), larval parasitoid of Acromyrmex subterraneus subterraneus (Forel) (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Loiácono, Marta, Margaría, Cecilia, Moreira, Denise D. O., Aquino, Daniel (2013): A new species of Szelenyiopria Fabritius (Hymenoptera: Diapriidae), larval parasitoid of Acromyrmex subterraneus subterraneus (Forel) (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3646 (3): 228-234, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3646.3.2
